articles.author: Jaclyn Gallucci
articles.title: American cruise passengers quarantined at U.S. military bases
articles.description: More than 300 American cruise ship passengers, including 14 who tested positive for coronavirus, were being quarantined at military bases in California and Texas on Monday after arriving from Japan on charter flights overnight.

articles.author: Claire Zillman, reporter
articles.title: ‘A slower return to normal:’ Apple expects to miss revenue targets due to China’s coronavirus
articles.description: It's experiencing "a slower return to normal" as China tries to grapple with the crisis.

articles.author: Brian O'Keefe
articles.title: Mapping a contagion: How the coronavirus may spread around the world
articles.description: How far and fast a virus spreads in today's world is less about physical distance and more about travel patterns of the humans carrying it.

articles.author: Claire Zillman, reporter
articles.title: Fears of a global coronavirus contagion rage as 3,000 cruise ship passengers return home
articles.description: Their worldwide transit is sparking concerns that the disease will spread far beyond its epicenter.
